Take away the attractiveness of the banks, the UHNW banking, the stock exchanges, what do they have left?Perhaps Hong Kong will fight hard in the next few decades to continue to be a strong capital market, after all, they are the only Chinese city to enjoy special rights and special capital/tax treatment. And Hong Kong people are strong fighters.
